alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor; Lafayette (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 8:16AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Lafayette, Dixie and southeastern Taylor Counties through 845 AM EDT... At 815 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bell to 11 miles northwest of Cross City to near Steinhatchee. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cross City, Steinhatchee, Horseshoe Point, Horseshoe Beach, Tennille, Fish Creek, Shamrock, Howell Place, Clara, Cross City Airport, Shired Island, Old Town, Guaranto Springs, Jena, Hines, Jonesboro, Hatch Bend, Bird Island, Eugene and Fletcher. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor; Lafayette
